text:
Hello all, do you know if this is possible to add some code like this in an email?

```<script src=<https://platform.linkedin.com/in.js> type="text/javascript"> lang: en_US</script>

<script type="IN/FollowCompany" data-id="XXXX" data-counter="bottom"></script>```
Thanks a lot!!
Sure. You can add it. It won't do anything though.
